channel.title: [Demise Pking V6] Perfect Skillcape Emotes And Updated vers
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/29dy2ra.png[/img]
[i]CLIENT + SOURCE NOW RELEASED WITHOUT ANTILEECH CAUSE I LOVE U GUYS[/i]
[U]This is my source, Massacred World heavily edited. The original source managed to obtain 120+ in a single month without hundreds of the features included. We reached no3 on the ********* toplist, and number one on the moparscape.[/U]
Never thought i'd release, but here we go.
[B]This is genuinely 5 months of me working on this server, which shockingly enough, was originally cammy PvP. It contains an insane amount of features in comparison to the original and practically instant and fun gameplay.[/B]
This is an instant pking server, and a massive starter is placed in your bank when you begin. You must earn kills in order to wear items, and all items can be bought of no price.
I've learned so much about java and rsps over the last few months, and i've decided to release the source ive been working on during the time ive been at mopar as a thank you. There are a hell of a lot of things you can rip from this, and it is not packaged.
Have lots of fun!
Source Download [NO ANTILEECH]: [B][url=http://uppit.com/yla954s5gdhr/Demise_Pking_Source.rar]http://uppit.com/yla954s5gdhr/Demise_Pking_Source.rar[/url][/B] Client Download [NO ANTILEECH]: [B][url=http://uppit.com/8f876dwlw0f1/Demise_Pking_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/8f876dwlw0f1/Demise_Pking_Client.rar[/url][/B]
[B][U]Features not shown in pictures:[/U][/B] -Shop system based on amount of kills you have, where kills do not decrease when bought. -Entirely new yell system including ranks dependant on kills. -Quest tab based instant spawning. -NPC Clipping. -New 525 NPC's almost all animated. -All new godsword specials. -All new prayers (excluding turmoil). -Fixing of around 200+ bugs.
[B][U]Pictures:[/U][/B] [IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/9492/itemskeptondeath.png[/img] [IMG]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/9382/newscoreboard.png[/img] [IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/6602/shopm.png[/img] [IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/1013/ghoultakesyoursoul.png[/img] [IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/1774/transparentcontextmenus.png[/img] [IMG]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/7876/525dancing.png[/img] [IMG]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/817/525whipanimation.png[/img] [IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/4069/bandagetable.png[/img] [IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/527/vlsspec.png[/img] [IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/7798/statiusspecial.png[/img] [IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/994/anchorspec.png[/img] [IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/8690/cbowbolteffect.png[/img] [IMG]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/9844/editedspecialsdds.png[/img] [IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/5193/instantgmaul.png[/img] [IMG]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/905/knives.png[/img] [IMG]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/2189/rangefollowing.png[/img] [IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/1041/autocasting.png[/img] [IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/8251/fadinginandout.png[/img] [IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/6130/walkbackwardsone.png[/img] [IMG]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/3065/walkbackwardstwo.png[/img]
[B][U]Gifs:[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2ezo6tj.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/11b290z.gif[/img]
[u][b]Credits[/b][/u] Me <3 Delta Sadistic <3 Tasha Jinrake Yarnova Shoes »kLeptØ« <3 Tonic And anyone else I missed out that helped me over the last 5 months :).
[B]Source Download: [url=http://uppit.com/yla954s5gdhr/Demise_Pking_Source.rar]http://uppit.com/yla954s5gdhr/Demise_Pking_Source.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://uppit.com/3omip3vbraeo/Demise_Pking_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/3omip3vbraeo/Demise_Pking_Client.rar[/url][/B]
[B][U]Yes, this is heavily edited non packaged delta. Don't go hatin.[/U][/B]
Thanks very much everyone that released tutorials and helped me on the forums, have fun with this source and client and i'd love to hear if anyone starts to use. it is genuinely perfect for instant hosting, and im convinced you can achieve atleast double what I did ;).
[B]Pm me if you need any help, I quit doing rsps.[/B]

item.description:
@socceroos11 wrote:

29dy2ra.png700×200

CLIENT + SOURCE NOW RELEASED WITHOUT ANTILEECH CAUSE I LOVE U GUYS

This is my source, Massacred World heavily edited. The original source managed to obtain 120+ in a single month without hundreds of the features included. We reached no3 on the ********* toplist, and number one on the moparscape.

Never thought i’d release, but here we go.

This is genuinely 5 months of me working on this server, which shockingly enough, was originally cammy PvP. It contains an insane amount of features in comparison to the original and practically instant and fun gameplay.

This is an instant pking server, and a massive starter is placed in your bank when you begin. You must earn kills in order to wear items, and all items can be bought of no price.

I’ve learned so much about java and rsps over the last few months, and i’ve decided to release the source ive been working on during the time ive been at mopar as a thank you. There are a hell of a lot of things you can rip from this, and it is not packaged.

Have lots of fun!

Source Download [NO ANTILEECH]: http://uppit.com/yla954s5gdhr/Demise_Pking_Source.rar
Client Download [NO ANTILEECH]: http://uppit.com/8f876dwlw0f1/Demise_Pking_Client.rar

Features not shown in pictures:
-Shop system based on amount of kills you have, where kills do not decrease when bought.
-Entirely new yell system including ranks dependant on kills.
-Quest tab based instant spawning.
-NPC Clipping.
-New 525 NPC’s almost all animated.
-All new godsword specials.
-All new prayers (excluding turmoil).
-Fixing of around 200+ bugs.

Pictures:



















Gifs:

Credits
Me <3
Delta
Sadistic <3
Tasha

And anyone else I missed out that helped me over the last 5 months :).

Source Download: http://uppit.com/yla954s5gdhr/Demise_Pking_Source.rar
Client Download: http://uppit.com/3omip3vbraeo/Demise_Pking_Client.rar

Yes, this is heavily edited non packaged delta. Don’t go hatin.

Thanks very much everyone that released tutorials and helped me on the forums, have fun with this source and client and i’d love to hear if anyone starts to use. it is genuinely perfect for instant hosting, and im convinced you can achieve atleast double what I did ;).

Pm me if you need any help, I quit doing rsps.
